title: Premiere Pro update adds GIF transparency and hardware encoding support
content:
Following an update to Photoshop for iPad, Adobe also released a new version of its video editor Premiere Pro on Tuesday. In addition to new features such as GIF transparency and HDR proxies, the software now supports hardware encoding for faster exports.

moreâ€¦

The post Premiere Pro update adds GIF transparency and hardware encoding support appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Adobe released a new version of Premiere Pro with support for GIF transparency and hardware encoding for faster exports.
